item.title: Face Plane
item.description: My lazy ass was bored due to qurantine, so I saw in video about making gift wrapping by flattening a face video. So here is my own version of it import cv2 from tqdm import tqdm WIDTH = 15 cap = cv2.VideoCapture("2.mp4") outputImage = None once = True total = int(cap.get(cv2.CAP_PROP_FRAME_COUNT)) for _ in tqdm(range(total)): ret, frame = cap.read() frame = cv2.rotate(frame, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE) w,h,_ = frame.shape if once: outputImage = frame[:,h//2:(h//2)+WIDTH,:] once = False else: outputImage = cv2.

item.title: Most Recommended Movies
item.description: Everyone has their own taste of content. Some like romance, some like horror. Me being a very big film connoisseur, I thought of sharing favorite movies in no specific order. I might keep on adding to this list Index Index Schindler’s List Usual Suspects 1917 A Silent Voice (Koi No Katachi) Your Name (Kimi No Nawa) Joker Parasite Pianist Jojo Rabbit 12 Angry Men Schindler’s List Schindler’s List is the living memorial of the horrors happened durinig holocaust.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Thanks for visiting my website. I will try my best to update this regularly with posts I like.
